ui_lang.Multiple MP4 videos can be selected and: Multiple MP4 videos can be selected and automatically queued for processing
ui_lang.Select where to save the processed outpu: Select where to save the processed output resources
ui_lang.shuoming01: Click to listen to the pronunciation of the current dubbing character,Generating dubbing may take a few seconds, please be patient and wait
ui_lang.The language used for the original video: The language used for the original video pronunciation
ui_lang.What language do you want to translate i: What language do you want to translate into
ui_lang.From base to large v3, the effect is get: From base to large v3, the effect is getting better and better, but the speed is also getting slower and slower
ui_lang.Overall recognition is suitable for vide: Overall recognition is suitable for videos with or without background music and noticeable silence
ui_lang.shuoming02:
Embedded subtitles always display subtitles no matter where they are played and cannot be hidden.If supported by the player, soft subtitles can be controlled to be displayed or hidden in the player.
,If you want to display subtitles when playing on a webpage, please select embedded subtitles.
ui_lang.Mute duration for segmented speech, in m: Mute duration for segmented speech, in milliseconds
ui_lang.Overall acceleration or deceleration of: Overall acceleration or deceleration of voice over playback
ui_lang.Positive numbers accelerate, negative nu: Positive numbers accelerate, negative numbers decelerate, -90 to+90
ui_lang.shuoming03:
The duration of pronunciation varies in different languages after translation, for example, if a sentence is in Chinese for 3 seconds, it may take 5 seconds to translate it into English, resulting in inconsistency between the duration and the video.
Two solutions:
1. Force voice over to accelerate playback, in order to shorten the duration of voice over and align with the video
2. Force the video to play slowly in order to extend the video duration and align the voice over.
Choose only one of the two options
ui_lang.shuoming04:
The duration of pronunciation varies in different languages after translation, for example, if a sentence is in Chinese for 3 seconds, it may take 5 seconds to translate it into English, resulting in inconsistency between the duration and the video.
Two solutions:
1. Force voice over to accelerate playback, in order to shorten the duration of voice over and align with the video
2. Force the video to play slowly in order to extend the video duration and align the voice over.
Choose only one of the two options
ui_lang.shuoming05: It is necessary to ensure that there is an NVIDIA graphics card and that the CUDA environment is correctly configured, therwise do not choose
ui_lang.Display all options for video translatio: Display all options for video translation and dubbing
ui_lang.Extracting SRT subtitles in the original: Extracting SRT subtitles in the original language from local videos
ui_lang.Embed locally existing SRT subtitles int: Embed locally existing SRT subtitles into the video
ui_lang.Local existing SRT subtitle generation d: Local existing SRT subtitle generation dubbing WAV files
ui_lang.Recognize the sound in audio or video an: Recognize the sound in audio or video and output SRT text
ui_lang.Generate audio WAV from text or SRT subt: Generate audio WAV from text or SRT subtitle files
ui_lang.Extract SRT subtitles from local videos: Extract SRT subtitles from local videos in the original language and translate them into SRT subtitle files in the target language
ui_lang.Separate audio and silent videos from vi: Separate audio and silent videos from videos
ui_lang.Merge audio, video, and subtitles into o: Merge audio, video, and subtitles into one file
ui_lang.Convert various formats to each other: Convert various formats to each other
ui_lang.Mix two audio files into one audio file: Mix two audio files into one audio file
